statement.p: For the right triangle below, find the length of b.

A triangle. Going around counterclockwise, an angle is unlabeled and its opposite side is labeled b. An angle is labeled 41 degrees and its opposite side is labeled 23 in. An angle has a right angle symbol.

p.em: Enter the value for \displaystyle{b} (accurate to at least two decimal places) and include the units of measure.
